subject: Attn: Sir,
body:
Attn: Sir,
We have been mandated by the Neil Carlton to Pay-Out all outstanding
Funds with An Empire Management Finance that has been approved for
Payment. Your Approved Payment was transferred to us to correct all
the irregularities that have delayed the Payment and remit the Payment
to you without any further delay. We have been instructed to remit the
Funds to you according to our choice Mode of Payment as listed below;
(i)Bank to Bank Transfer
(ii) Crypto Currency
As soon as we receive your response, we will forward you our Fund
Release Form for completion.
Best Regards,
Patrick Paul
(Director of Legal)

subject: Re: Attn: Sir,
body:
Hello Patrick Paul,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's quite interesting to hear about this approved payment. I must admit, I'm a bit surprised as I don't recall having any pending funds with An Empire Management Finance.

Could you please provide more details about this? How did my name come up in your records? And could you explain a bit more about the choice Mode of Payment?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steve
